name: About-me
body:
## Welcome!

I am a hobbyist who has enjoyed coding for over several years and have gained familiarity programming in the following languages and technologies:

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- VBScript
- VBA

Presently, I am pursing a greater understanding of Javascript **MEAN** MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js. In six months, I want to build a compelling portfolio for several potential employers who are offering job opportunities for a junior position within mid-size tech firms. This is huge opportunity for as it may lead to a fulfilling career change from business operations to front-end development.
 

### Contact
JCBKW
[GitHub](https://github.com/jcbkw/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
